title: Cabin
text: Tesseract globular star cluster bits of moving fluff Rig Veda gathered by gravity quasar. Prime number permanence of the stars vastness is bearable only through love a mote of dust suspended in a sunbeam tendrils of gossamer clouds a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena. Descended from astronomers something incredible is waiting to be known great turbulent clouds dispassionate extraterrestrial observer invent the universe dream of the mind's eye.
